name: Boxing Mania: Fun Fighter Game
description:
BOXING MANIA - THE BEST FIGHTING GAME FOR KIDS!

Strike down a gang of bad guys and fight alongside Robbie to recover the girl of his dreams, Mikaela.

Robbie was a happy-go-lucky guy enjoying a peaceful school life... that was until his arch nemesis Gregory kidnapped the girl of his dreams. Now it’s up to Robbie to defeat Gregory’s gang of lackeys, who don't exactly fight fair, and rescue Mikaela!

Boxing Mania features 10 unique characters, each with their own special signature move. Fight alongside Robbie in 20 levels with striking HD backgrounds and moving story illustrations. Get the right timing and unleash your special ability on your opponent and win back Mikaela.

The Battle is On!

BOXING MANIA FEATURES:
---------------------------------
- 10 cartoon fighters to LOL while you fight
- 20 engaging levels that will put you in Robbie’s world
- Battle friends on the leaderboard
- Facebook & Twitter integration
- Simple tapping controls! Just tap left-right-left (then your special move!)
